# `ssoca env remove ...`

Remove an environment

    Usage:
      ssoca [OPTIONS] env remove
    
    Application Options:
          --config=      Configuration file path (default: ~/.ssoca/config) [$SSOCA_CONFIG]
      -e, --environment= Environment name [$SSOCA_ENVIRONMENT]
    
    Help Options:
      -h, --help         Show this help message
